scripts.say: I had a feeling I got away too easily... But if I must fight to survive, then I will...!
Still willing to fight, even with a capital ship on your tail? I suppose that's why you Royal Navy carriers are so revered.
Wait! You're no heavy cruiser, you're Gneisenau...! I've heard much about you... I think I know the answer, but I must ask: would you be willing to let our fleet proceed without incident?
I'm honored that you know my name. And no, I can't simply let you be on your merry way.
That leaves me with little choice but to fight you...
